main event: A witness reported seeing one or two white objects with a 'licking motion' traveling very fast over Louisville, Kentucky, on June 30, 1956.
interesting points: The objects were described as not being as large as a locomotive,The observer estimated the objects to be 150-200 feet in diameter at an altitude of 2000-3000 feet,The sighting occurred at dusk,The objects were observed for about 30 seconds and seemed to slow down, hover, and then accelerate away,The sighting may have been explained by known aircraft in the area at the time.
witness description: The observer claimed to have substantial experience in identifying aircraft, being an airline pilot.
